questions.text: Have I been happy when others are sad or failed?
Have I been jealous of others' toys or talents?
Have I shared what I have with others?
Have I said mean things because I was jealous?
Have I helped others when I could?
Have I wanted what others have even when I have enough?
Have I talked nicely about others or made fun of them?
Have I thanked God for the gifts others have?
Have I celebrated my friends' success or good news?
Have I kept love in my heart even when it’s hard?
Have I done my chores or homework without complaining?
Have I wasted time when I should have been working?
Have I done my best in school or at home?
Have I helped without being asked?
Have I finished what I started?
Have I prayed even when I didn’t feel like it?
Have I taken care of my things responsibly?
Have I used time well instead of being lazy?
Have I done what I promised to do?
Have I worked cheerfully or complained a lot?
Have I watched or talked about things I know are bad?
Have I respected my body and others' bodies?
Have I dressed in a way that honors God?
Have I used bad words or jokes?
Have I looked at pictures or videos I shouldn’t?
Have I treated others with kindness and not like objects?
Have I kept my thoughts pure?
Have I talked about private things in a wrong way?
Have I respected others’ personal space?
Have I remembered that my body is a gift from God?
Have I yelled or lost my temper at others?
Have I been mean when I didn’t get my way?
Have I hit or hurt anyone in anger?
Have I forgiven someone who hurt me?
Have I held a grudge or wanted to get back at someone?
Have I stayed calm when things didn’t go my way?
Have I argued a lot with family or friends?
Have I been kind to people I don’t like?
Have I let little things bother me too much?
Have I remembered that Jesus teaches me to forgive?
Have I shared my toys or snacks happily?
Have I taken more than my fair share?
Have I said please and thank you?
Have I helped someone even when I didn’t feel like it?
Have I taken something that didn’t belong to me?
Have I let someone else go first?
Have I been grateful for what I have?
Have I wanted more and more things?
Have I given without expecting something back?
Have I thought of others before myself?
Have I eaten too much just because I wanted to?
Have I wanted more treats even when I was full?
Have I watched too much TV or used devices too long?
Have I said no when I needed to stop?
Have I waited patiently instead of demanding things?
Have I made healthy choices with food and play?
Have I remembered that fun is good but not everything?
Have I been greedy for more screen time?
Have I been self-controlled when I didn’t get what I wanted?
Have I thanked God for what I have instead of wanting more?
Have I bragged or acted like I’m better than others?
Have I listened to advice from parents or teachers?
Have I said sorry when I did something wrong?
Have I thought I’m too good to help with little things?
Have I let others go first or tried to be first always?
Have I helped others even when no one was watching?
Have I said thank you and please often?
Have I accepted help without feeling bad?
Have I put others first instead of showing off?
Have I remembered that God gave me all my gifts?
